series.title: Men.Style.com: Fashion, Gear & Style for Men
series.author: Men.style.com

episodes.seriesTitle: Men.Style.com: Fashion, Gear & Style for Men
episodes.title: Obsessives: Hunt Slonem
episodes.author: Men.Style.com
episodes.summary: As we found on a tour of his massive NYC studio, Slonem's fascination with both color and animals extends far beyond the canvas.

episodes.seriesTitle: Men.Style.com: Fashion, Gear & Style for Men
episodes.title: Douglas Fir
episodes.author: Men.Style.com
episodes.summary: For the last seven years, this Third Street outpost has been bringing a new sense of European subtlety to L.A. style. Tyler Thoreson talks shop with co-owner Jon Noble.

episodes.seriesTitle: Men.Style.com: Fashion, Gear & Style for Men
episodes.title: Jack Taylor
episodes.author: Men.Style.com
episodes.summary: Jack Taylor has made suits for everyone from Cary Grant to David Arquette--and if you don't like the way he makes them, he'll be happy to tell you to take your business elsewhere.

episodes.seriesTitle: Men.Style.com: Fashion, Gear & Style for Men
episodes.title: Store Tours: L.A. - Blackman Cruz
episodes.author: Men.Style.com
episodes.summary: In the market for a skull lamp, hand-made prison shiv, or perhaps a massive column of whale vertebrae? Look no further than this legendary L.A. design emporium.

episodes.seriesTitle: Men.Style.com: Fashion, Gear & Style for Men
episodes.title: Store Tours: L.A. - American Rag
episodes.author: Men.Style.com
episodes.summary: What started as a vintage shop in San Francisco is now one of L.A.'s top denim destinations. Tyler Thoreson takes a look around.

episodes.seriesTitle: Men.Style.com: Fashion, Gear & Style for Men
episodes.title: Pharrell Williams, Connoisseur
episodes.author: Men.Style.com
episodes.summary: On a recent visit to Ice Cream and Billionaire Boys Club in Soho, we asked the producer, designer, and burgeoning retailer to explain his acquisitive nature.

episodes.seriesTitle: Men.Style.com: Fashion, Gear & Style for Men
episodes.title: Obsessives: Mihara Yasuhiro
episodes.author: Men.Style.com
episodes.summary: And you thought all monsters were alike. As Tokyo-based designer Mihara Yasuhiro illustrates, each has his own distinct personalityand voice.

episodes.seriesTitle: Men.Style.com: Fashion, Gear & Style for Men
episodes.title: Obsessives: Gordon Hull
episodes.author: Men.Style.com
episodes.summary: We follow Surface to Air co-founder and creative director Gordon Hull on a quest to find NYC's best burger. Warning: some material may not be suitable for vegetarians.

episodes.seriesTitle: Men.Style.com: Fashion, Gear & Style for Men
episodes.title: Yves St. Laurent: Fall 2008
episodes.author: Men.Style.com
episodes.summary: In Paris, YSL creative director Stefano Pilati ditched the catwalk and presented his latest collection via a seven-minute film scored by Michel Gaubert and starring UK actor Simon Woods.

episodes.seriesTitle: Men.Style.com: Fashion, Gear & Style for Men
episodes.title: Obsessives: Seymour Cassel
episodes.author: Men.Style.com
episodes.summary: The don of indie acting discusses his favorite vice (hint: Polanski's involved, but it's legal... mostly.)

episodes.seriesTitle: Men.Style.com: Fashion, Gear & Style for Men
episodes.title: Obsessives: Alan Cumming
episodes.author: Men.Style.com
episodes.summary: Every actor needs a proper vice. For Alan Cumming, it's the vodka martini, straight up, with a twist--and a drop or three of innuendo.

episodes.seriesTitle: Men.Style.com: Fashion, Gear & Style for Men
episodes.title: Obsessives: Hawaii Mike
episodes.author: Men.Style.com
episodes.summary: LTD magazine founder "Hawaii" Mike Salman started collecting Nikes back when most sneakerheads were still rocking Baby Jordans. Four hundred pairs later, he's still at it.

episodes.seriesTitle: Men.Style.com: Fashion, Gear & Style for Men
episodes.title: Store Tours: United Arrows, Tokyo
episodes.author: Men.Style.com
episodes.summary: As Tim Blanks discovers, a new style amalgam is emerging at Tokyo's famous men's boutique. Call it salaryman meets street.

episodes.seriesTitle: Men.Style.com: Fashion, Gear & Style for Men
episodes.title: Obsessives: Philip Crangi
episodes.author: Men.Style.com
episodes.summary: Ever wonder where old stuff goes when you throw it out? It may well end up in the New York studio of compulsive collector (and noted men's jewelry designer) Philip Crangi.

episodes.seriesTitle: Men.Style.com: Fashion, Gear & Style for Men
episodes.title: Obsessives: Kim Jones
episodes.author: Men.Style.com
episodes.summary: The club kid-turned-designer reveals his fascination with the weird and wonderful fashions of London's late-eighties scene.

episodes.seriesTitle: Men.Style.com: Fashion, Gear & Style for Men
episodes.title: Store Tours: New York - The Future Perfect
episodes.author: Men.Style.com
episodes.summary: As Tyler Thoreson finds, David Alhadeff's Williamsburg design mecca more than lives up to its grammatically challenging name.

episodes.seriesTitle: Men.Style.com: Fashion, Gear & Style for Men
episodes.title: Obsessives: Gene Krell
episodes.author: Men.Style.com
episodes.summary: He may be a front-row fixture, but Vogue Japan international fashion director Gene Krell is just as happy hitting the beach in board shorts, in search of the perfect wave.

episodes.seriesTitle: Men.Style.com: Fashion, Gear & Style for Men
episodes.title: Store Tours: Tokyo - Icho
episodes.author: Men.Style.com
episodes.summary: Even in a world gone crazy for custom, Icho stands out. Its tailors don't just make clothes to measure--they create the fabric itself to your precise specs.

episodes.seriesTitle: Men.Style.com: Fashion, Gear & Style for Men
episodes.title: Store Tours: Tokyo - Project 1/6
episodes.author: Men.Style.com
episodes.summary: In the market for an Andy Warhol-Mickey Mouse hybrid doll, or perhaps a mini Jack Bauer? Tim Blanks encounters both (and even buys one) at this Tokyo mecca of collectible toys.

episodes.seriesTitle: Men.Style.com: Fashion, Gear & Style for Men
episodes.title: Special Features: Inside Agent Provocateur
episodes.author: Men.Style.com
episodes.summary: In another milestone in men's service journalism, Agent Provocateur co-founder Serena Rees offers some expert advice for your next trip to the knickers-and-lace department.

episodes.seriesTitle: Men.Style.com: Fashion, Gear & Style for Men
episodes.title: Obsessives: RZA
episodes.author: Men.Style.com
episodes.summary: Between the movie roles (American Gangster) and Wu-Tang records, RZA always finds time to fit in a (mostly) friendly game of chess. He doesn't always win, though.

episodes.seriesTitle: Men.Style.com: Fashion, Gear & Style for Men
episodes.title: Special Features: Inside Agent Provocateur, Part 2
episodes.author: Men.Style.com
episodes.summary: On a tour of her London shop, Agent Provocateur co-founder Serena Rees provides some penetrating insight on the art and, yes, science of good lingerie.

episodes.seriesTitle: Men.Style.com: Fashion, Gear & Style for Men
episodes.title: Store Tours: New York - Seize Sur Vingt
episodes.author: Men.Style.com
episodes.summary: James Jurney's burgeoning Elizabeth Street empire offers essential provisions for the modern dandy, from multihued gingham to early-eighties Aston Martins.

episodes.seriesTitle: Men.Style.com: Fashion, Gear & Style for Men
episodes.title: Obsessives: Ricky Gervais
episodes.author: Men.Style.com
episodes.summary: The man behind The Office and Extras gives us a glimpse into his innermost artistic obsessions. Wait, is he having a laugh?

episodes.seriesTitle: Men.Style.com: Fashion, Gear & Style for Men
episodes.title: The Obsessives: Carlo Brandelli
episodes.author: Men.Style.com
episodes.summary: The creative director of hip Savile Row tailor Kilgour explains his fascination with the mysterious British art of "keepie-uppie"

episodes.seriesTitle: Men.Style.com: Fashion, Gear & Style for Men
episodes.title: The Obsessives: Barking Irons
episodes.author: Men.Style.com
episodes.summary: Daniel and Michael Casarella discuss the untidy era of NYC history that inspires their clothing label.

episodes.seriesTitle: Men.Style.com: Fashion, Gear & Style for Men
episodes.title: Store Tour: Paris - Vuitton
episodes.author: Men.Style.com
episodes.summary: To say that walking into Vuittons recently opened flagship is like entering another world isnt an overstatement. In fact, its precisely the point.

episodes.seriesTitle: Men.Style.com: Fashion, Gear & Style for Men
episodes.title: Store Tour: Paris - L'Eclaireur
episodes.author: Men.Style.com
episodes.summary: Finding this tucked-away Paris boutique is only half the battle. Once inside, be prepared to offer yourself up to the whims of a very, comment dit-on and French sales staff.

episodes.seriesTitle: Men.Style.com: Fashion, Gear & Style for Men
episodes.title: Store Tour: Paris - Goyard
episodes.author: Men.Style.com
episodes.summary: Even after more than a century in businessselling to everyone from the Duke of Windsor to Karl LagerfeldFrances most storied luggage purveyor still has a few tricks up its sleeve.

episodes.seriesTitle: Men.Style.com: Fashion, Gear & Style for Men
episodes.title: Store Tour: Paris - Colette
episodes.author: Men.Style.com
episodes.summary: Ten years after its founding, Colettes brand of carefully-edited eclectism pervades the retail worldand yet no one does it better than the Paris original.

episodes.seriesTitle: Men.Style.com: Fashion, Gear & Style for Men
episodes.title: Store Tour: Paris - Charvet
episodes.author: Men.Style.com
episodes.summary: Hundreds of fabric swatches, up to 18 custom measurements per customer, endless attention...

episodes.seriesTitle: Men.Style.com: Fashion, Gear & Style for Men
episodes.title: Video Diaries: David Wain's Guide to Sundance
episodes.author: Men.Style.com
episodes.summary: Before Sundance, we gave The Ten director a camera and instructions (i.e., get shots of Winona).

episodes.seriesTitle: Men.Style.com: Fashion, Gear & Style for Men
episodes.title: Milan Highlights: Fall 2007 Menswear
episodes.author: Men.Style.com
episodes.summary: Dolce & Gabbana, Burberry, Giorgio Armani, Gucci, Jil Sander, Alexander McQueen, and Prada.

episodes.seriesTitle: Men.Style.com: Fashion, Gear & Style for Men
episodes.title: Paris Highlights: Fall 2007 Menswear
episodes.author: Men.Style.com
episodes.summary: Galliano, YSL, Lanvin, Paul Smith, Raf Simons, Dries Van Noten, Louis Vuitton, and Dior Homme.

episodes.seriesTitle: Men.Style.com: Fashion, Gear & Style for Men
episodes.title: Store Tour: NYC - Rogan
episodes.author: Men.Style.com
episodes.summary: Tim Blanks talks to jean genius Rogan Gregory about his fashions, philosophy, and future.

episodes.seriesTitle: Men.Style.com: Fashion, Gear & Style for Men
episodes.title: Store Tour: London - Richard James
episodes.author: Men.Style.com
episodes.summary: The Savile Row rebel-cum-statesman discusses tailoring, jeans, and why a night at the opera calls for camouflage.

episodes.seriesTitle: Men.Style.com: Fashion, Gear & Style for Men
episodes.title: Store Tour: London - Harvey Nichols
episodes.author: Men.Style.com
episodes.summary: A visit to the legendary London shopping emporium, with menswear buyer Richard Johnson.

episodes.seriesTitle: Men.Style.com: Fashion, Gear & Style for Men
episodes.title: Store Tour: London - The Library
episodes.author: Men.Style.com
episodes.summary: Peter Siddell of London's The Library applies vision--and yes, the Dewey decimal system--to menswear.

episodes.seriesTitle: Men.Style.com: Fashion, Gear & Style for Men
episodes.title: Store Tour: London - Dover Street Market
episodes.author: Men.Style.com
episodes.summary: A look around the "beautiful chaos" of London's epicenter of avant-garde fashion.

episodes.seriesTitle: Men.Style.com: Fashion, Gear & Style for Men
episodes.title: Designer Q&A: Stefano Pilati
episodes.author: Men.Style.com
episodes.summary: Yves Saint Laurent's designer on the creative tension between the casual and the formal.

episodes.seriesTitle: Men.Style.com: Fashion, Gear & Style for Men
episodes.title: Designer Q&A: Giorgio Armani
episodes.author: Men.Style.com
episodes.summary: The don of Milan on the city, his influences, and the changing definition of elegance.

episodes.seriesTitle: Men.Style.com: Fashion, Gear & Style for Men
episodes.title: Designer Q&A: Frida Giannini
episodes.author: Men.Style.com
episodes.summary: Gucci's creative director talks shop on the eve of her first men's collection for the Italian label.

episodes.seriesTitle: Men.Style.com: Fashion, Gear & Style for Men
episodes.title: Adam Yauch
episodes.author: Men.Style.com
episodes.summary: The Beastie Boy-turned-director raps about NYC back in the day, why the music comes first, and the philosophy behind his new film, Gunnin' for that #1 Spot.

episodes.seriesTitle: Men.Style.com: Fashion, Gear & Style for Men
episodes.title: Style Sages: Alan Flusser
episodes.author: Men.Style.com
episodes.summary: What's the secret to dressing well? Why can't Brad Pitt pick out his own clothes? For the first in a series of videos, we put those questions and more to tailor and author Alan Flusser.

episodes.seriesTitle: Men.Style.com: Fashion, Gear & Style for Men
episodes.title: Obsessives: David Chang
episodes.author: Men.Style.com
episodes.summary: For Momofuku kingpin David Chang, a cookbook isn't just a repository of recipes-it's the ultimate expression of a chef's status as culinary badass.

episodes.seriesTitle: Men.Style.com: Fashion, Gear & Style for Men
episodes.title: Duckie Brown: Fall 2009
episodes.author: Men.Style.com
episodes.summary: How will the Duckie Brown man weather the current climate? With copious attitude, luxurious outerwear--and hazmat--orange gloves.

episodes.seriesTitle: Men.Style.com: Fashion, Gear & Style for Men
episodes.title: Rag & Bone: Fall 2009
episodes.author: Men.Style.com
episodes.summary: Inspired by a trip to Japan-not to mention an age that seems to require a warrior's toughness-David Neville and Marcus Wainwright created a collection for the modern street samurai.

episodes.seriesTitle: Men.Style.com: Fashion, Gear & Style for Men
episodes.title: Calvin Klein Collection: Fall 2009
episodes.author: Men.Style.com
episodes.summary: The big story going in? A return to NYC after several seasons showing in Milan. The big news coming out? Razor-sharp tailoring; strong, all-American silhouettes; and--Kanye's favorite--a series of molded wool Tron jackets.

episodes.seriesTitle: Men.Style.com: Fashion, Gear & Style for Men
episodes.title: Bottega Venta: Spring 2009
episodes.author: Men.Style.com
episodes.summary: Creative director Tomas Maier on why men should cover up and say no to nudity.

episodes.seriesTitle: Men.Style.com: Fashion, Gear & Style for Men
episodes.title: Calvin Klein: Spring 2009
episodes.author: Men.Style.com
episodes.summary: Creative director Italo Zucchelli explains his European approach to American sportswear, and what was up with all the gray-haired models on his runway

episodes.seriesTitle: Men.Style.com: Fashion, Gear & Style for Men
episodes.title: Dolce & Gabbana: Spring 2009
episodes.author: Men.Style.com
episodes.summary: Stefano Gabbana discusses the duo's newly relaxed tailoring, inspired by pajama jackets and spending time with his dog.

episodes.seriesTitle: Men.Style.com: Fashion, Gear & Style for Men
episodes.title: Gucci: Spring 2009
episodes.author: Men.Style.com
episodes.summary: Tim Blanks speaks with Frida Giannini about her tropically inspired collection, while James Franco sings the praises of the Gucci suit.

episodes.seriesTitle: Men.Style.com: Fashion, Gear & Style for Men
episodes.title: Giorgio Armani: Spring 2009
episodes.author: Men.Style.com
episodes.summary: Tim Blanks talks to the designer about his latest version of "classico con twist," and gets second opinions from noted fashion critics Adrien Brody and Terrell Owens

episodes.seriesTitle: Men.Style.com: Fashion, Gear & Style for Men
episodes.title: Obsessives: Fabio
episodes.author: Men.Style.com
episodes.summary: Steve McQueen may have done all his own stunts, but did he have 200 motorcycles? Well, Fabio does--and he was kind enough to give us a look at his ever-expanding collection.

episodes.seriesTitle: Men.Style.com: Fashion, Gear & Style for Men
episodes.title: Store Tours: Tokyo - BAPE Exclusive
episodes.author: Men.Style.com
episodes.summary: Sneakers may be only a part of Nigo's global streetwear empire, but, as Tim Blanks discovers, they're still the main attraction at his Tokyo flagship.

episodes.seriesTitle: Men.Style.com: Fashion, Gear & Style for Men
episodes.title: Obsessives: Rogan Gregory
episodes.author: Men.Style.com
episodes.summary: The denim guru and downtown fixture takes his commitment to going green seriously—very seriously.

episodes.seriesTitle: Men.Style.com: Fashion, Gear & Style for Men
episodes.title: Obsessives: Evan Yurman
episodes.author: Men.Style.com
episodes.summary: While others fixate on vintage Ferraris or Jags, men's jewelry designer Evan Yurman has his sights set on something closer to home: the classic American muscle car.

episodes.seriesTitle: Men.Style.com: Fashion, Gear & Style for Men
episodes.title: Freemans Sporting Club
episodes.author: Men.Style.com
episodes.summary: From handmade American classics to straight-blade shaves, rustic Americana rules at Taavo Somer Lower East Side emporium.

episodes.seriesTitle: Men.Style.com: Fashion, Gear & Style for Men
episodes.title: Opening Ceremony
episodes.author: Men.Style.com
episodes.summary: Tyler Thoreson pays a visit to Humberto Leon and Carol Lim's influential, international-flavored downtown boutique, where as in other areasit's U.S. versus the world.

episodes.seriesTitle: Men.Style.com: Fashion, Gear & Style for Men
episodes.title: Seize Sur Vingt
episodes.author: Men.Style.com
episodes.summary: James Jurney's burgeoning Elizabeth Street empire offers essential provisions for the modern dandy, from multihued gingham to early-eighties Aston Martins.

episodes.seriesTitle: Men.Style.com: Fashion, Gear & Style for Men
episodes.title: The Future Perfect
episodes.author: Men.Style.com
episodes.summary: As Tyler Thoreson finds, David Alhadeffs Williamsburg design mecca more than lives up to its grammatically challenging name.

episodes.seriesTitle: Men.Style.com: Fashion, Gear & Style for Men
episodes.title: Style Sages: Gay Talese
episodes.author: Men.Style.com
episodes.summary: New Journalism pioneer Gay Talese is known for three things: groundbreaking magazine work ("Frank Sinatra Has A Cold"), best-selling books (Thy Neighbor's Wife), and an unrivaled passion for the art of tailoring (watch, and you'll see).
